attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app has nothing informational, nothing to persuasive for his campaign. He’s a bad person and a horrible president,I do not recommend this AT ALL.

attributes.title: horrible app🧚🏼✨
attributes.review: i opened the app and i was just scrolling through when i get an email that said someone hacked all of my social media and my bank info was leaked. i had to make new accounts and fix things with my bank, please don’t get this app it’s absolute trash just like the orange carrot himself💫😘🧚🏼

attributes.title: this app is a waste of time👺
attributes.review: this app took over 3 hours to download and all i wanted to do was try to support our lovely homophobic and racist president😔 after it loaded all i heard was this weird sound and it was flashing his 🟠 face😭 i now go to therapy from the scaring images of him and the sound still haunts me to this day🤕

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
